comment: her MWF classes are basically MW. super easy grader. 3 papers (easy) and one speech (also easy). she is a very easy and gracious grader. discussion posts due every sunday, they take like 15 mins. shes super chill and nice. attendance is absolutely mandatory. very chill class and easy A if you put in a little bit of work. take her!!!!

She has such a kind soul. You have 6 free absences, 3 papers, easy discussion posts due every sunday night, and a final presentation. She is very understanding and cares for her students. DEFINITELY TAKE HER!!!

She is the best! You can tell she really cares about her students. She gives you different opportunities to better your grade. Overall she was one of my favorite professors, and I hope I can have her again. I 100% recommend her.

Garcia is overall an easy professor. You have 6 free absences, and a discussion post every sunday due at 11:59. There are 3 papers overall and she is an easy grader as long as you follow the guidelines of the paper. If it is a MWF class you will most likely never have class Fridays. Gives busy work on rare occasions but definitely an easy A.
